meanings.definition: Provide with excessive comforts or advantages.
meanings.sent1: The hotel featherbedded its guests with luxurious amenities.
meanings.sent2: She featherbedded her pet cat with a soft bed and tasty treats.
meanings.sent3: The pampered puppy was featherbedded with massages and gourmet meals.
meanings.sent4: The wealthy businessman was featherbedded with personal assistants and private jets.
meanings.sent5: The queen was featherbedded in her palace with silk sheets and golden furniture.

meanings.sent1: Parents often featherbedded their children with toys and sweets.
meanings.sent2: She featherbedded her best friend with gifts and compliments.
meanings.sent3: The pampered poodle was featherbedded with designer outfits and spa days.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity was featherbedded by fans who showered her with adoration.
meanings.sent5: The prince was featherbedded by servants who attended to his every whim.

meanings.definition: To give preferential treatment to someone.
meanings.sent1: The manager featherbedded his favorite employee with promotions and bonuses.
meanings.sent2: She featherbedded her sister by always letting her choose the movie.
meanings.sent3: The pampered prince was featherbedded with the best room in the castle.
meanings.sent4: The politician was featherbedded by lobbyists who funded his campaign.
meanings.sent5: The superstar was featherbedded by the media who always portrayed her in a positive light.
